KFunction.Name: fnMaskZipCode
KFunction.Desc: This function will mask a US ZIP code using the iEncryption Key. The function will find the entry index of the Zip Code in the full list of all available US Zip Codes, Then it will add the Encryption value to the index value and modulo it based on the number of available US Zip Codes. The new value is used as the index of the new Zip Code which will be returned.

Input.name: iEncryption
Input.Comment: The encryption used to mask the Zip Code
